message: Let's be fair, I'll take 90% and you get the remaining 10%.
Meet in the middle, 60% for me, 40% for you.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need more than 40%. Let's split it 55/45.
You're running out of time, Alice. Inflation is eating away at your share. I'll give you 30%.
This is my final offer. It's the best I can do with inflation hitting me hard.  Let's split it 40/60.
